Name: ASSERT( INTERRUPT_VECTOR$$Base >= GENERAL_EXCEPTION$$End, please reduce the size of input section GENERAL_EXCEPTION(VECTOR_ROUTINE))
ASSERT( (SDATA0$$ZI$$Limit - SDATA0$$ZI$$Base + SDATA0$$Limit - SDATA0$$Base) <= 0x10000,  small data of core0 exceed 64 KB)
ASSERT( (SDATA1$$ZI$$Limit - SDATA1$$ZI$$Base + SDATA1$$Limit - SDATA1$$Base) <= 0x10000,  small data of core1 exceed 64 KB)
